# ruff

Modern, ultra-fast linter that implements checks from Flake8 and some other popular plugins.

```{python}
#| echo: false
# Import required packages
import subprocess
from tools_helpers import generate_html, print_quarto
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
generate_html(
    pypi_url="https://pypi.org/project/ruff/",
    github_url="https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff",
    conda_url="https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/ruff"
)
```

## Run ruff using `lintquarto`

```{.bash}
lintquarto ruff general_example.qmd
```

:::{.pale-green}
<style>
.cell-output-stdout code {
  word-break: break-word !important;
  white-space: pre-wrap !important;
}
</style>
```{python}
#| echo: false
result = subprocess.run(
    ["lintquarto", "ruff", "examples/general_example.qmd"],
    capture_output=True, text=True
)
print(result.stdout)
```
:::
